# PriorityQueue&lt;T&gt;.Capacity property

Gets or sets the number of elements that the [`PriorityQueue`](../PriorityQueue-1.md) can contain.

```csharp
public int Capacity { get; set; }
```

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ArgumentOutOfRangeException | Capacity is set to a value that is less than [`Count`](Count.md). |
